com.radiotelescope.security

Interface UserContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakeUserContext, UserContextImpl

    public UserContext

    Provides abstract method definitions for role and permission checking

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Long currentUserId()
      Abstract method to grab the user id of the currently logged in user
      <S,E> SecuredAction<S,E> require(java.util.List<? extends com.radiotelescope.repository.role.UserRole.Role> requiredRoles, Command<? extends S,? extends E> successCommand)
      Abstract method declaration used when ALL roles in the UserRole.Role are required to pass validation
      <S,E> SecuredAction<S,E> requireAny(java.util.List<? extends com.radiotelescope.repository.role.UserRole.Role> requiredRoles, Command<? extends S,? extends E> successCommand)
      Abstract method declaration used when any role in the UserRole.Role is sufficient for validation

    • Method Detail

      • require

        <S,E> SecuredAction<S,E> require(java.util.List<? extends com.radiotelescope.repository.role.UserRole.Role> requiredRoles,
                                 Command<? extends S,? extends E> successCommand)

        Abstract method declaration used when ALL roles in the UserRole.Role are required to pass validation

        Parameters:
        requiredRoles - a list of all required enum UserRole.Role
        successCommand - interface Command object to be called upon successful authentication
        Returns:
        a interface SecuredAction object
        See Also:
        UserRole.Role

      • requireAny

        <S,E> SecuredAction<S,E> requireAny(java.util.List<? extends com.radiotelescope.repository.role.UserRole.Role> requiredRoles,
                                    Command<? extends S,? extends E> successCommand)

        Abstract method declaration used when any role in the UserRole.Role is sufficient for validation

        Parameters:
        requiredRoles - a list of any of the required enum UserRole.Role values.
        successCommand - interface Command object to be called upon successful authentication
        Returns:
        a interface SecuredAction object
